dcterms:creator: O. Vechtomova
G. Sahu
D. Kumar
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 18,000 WAV audio clips of original songs and their corresponding lyrics by seven music artists, used to train a system that generates lyric lines congruent with live instrumental music.
dcterms:title: Aligned lyric-music dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Devlin
M.-W. Chang
K. Lee
K. Toutanova
dcterms:description: A custom dataset consisting of 3600 high-quality and low-quality lines manually selected for training a BERT model to rank generated lyrics based on originality, creativity, poetic quality, and language fluency.
dcterms:title: Custom dataset for BERT
